name: Warchief

skills.name: Freezing Cold
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 15% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Marauder
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Provoke] debuff for 3 turns. Has a 75% chance of stealing 2 random buffs from the target. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF] dl Provoke
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Standstill
skills.raw_description: DEF increases by 10% for each dead ally.
